name: Troops to Trucks (CDL Waiver Program)
description: CDL skills test waiver for veterans with military driving experience; fast-track to commercial trucking career
fullDescription: The California Troops to Trucks program allows qualifying service members and veterans with military driving experience to obtain a commercial driver's license (CDL) without taking the driving skills test. This fast-tracks veterans into high-demand trucking careers.
whatTheyOffer:
- CDL skills test waiver for qualified veterans
- Applies to non-passenger commercial vehicles
- Faster path to Class A or B commercial license
- No need to retake driving portion of CDL test
- Leverages existing military driving experience
howToGetIt:
1. Must have military motor vehicle operator experience
2. Must have clean driving record (no serious violations in past 2 years)
3. Apply at California DMV with military driving documentation
4. Provide DD214 showing MOS with driving duties
5. Complete written CDL knowledge test
6. Skills test is waived - receive CDL
keywords: CDL, commercial driver license, truck driver, veteran, military, waiver, trucking, Class A, Class B, DD214, DMV
